An area in which Thales has unique expertise, notably because it is the only player that is a market-leader in equipment both on the aircraft and on the ground, and because it is on board a very broad range of civil and military aircraft. Need further information? Contact a digital identity and security speakers More than 30,000 organisations around the world have already trusted Thales with verifying the identities of people and objects, authorising access to digital services, analysing vast amounts of information in real time and encrypting data. The integration of Gemalto gives Thales unparalleled expertise in three key areas of digital security: biometrics and digital identity, secure IoT (Internet of Things) connectivity, and data protection through encryption. Our Digital Identity and Security experts

Need further information? Contact a connectivity speakers The rollout of 5G and the proliferation of connected objects – amongst other things – are going to generate a host of new services, which will simplify life for businesses and private citizens alike. At the same time, people want 24/7 mobile connectivity that is not only effective, but also secure. Thanks to the expertise of its teams and its dual mastery of digital and cybersecurity technologies, Thales has established itself as one of the only companies capable of developing seamless, safe and secure connectivity, anytime and anywhere.
